data.title: Explore the top 10 cities in Australia to work for immigrants
meta_keywords: apply for Australia PR Visa from India
data.meta_description: Learn about the top ten cities in Australia that offer great job openings to skilled overseas workers including the top sectors with employment.
data.text:
Sanjay Yadav

[Published 20 Jul, 2024 | 11:36 AM]

About Author - 5 min read

2707

Australia is among the top overseas destinations for people seeking exciting career opportunities. Most skilled professionals choose an Australia Skilled Visa pathway for their immigration applications. However, before you decide to move to Australia, it is crucial to finalize the location or city that offers suitable job prospects.

Check eligibility for Australia PR Visa

Here are the top 10 cities in Australia with the best employment opportunities:

1. Adelaide - South Australia

The fifth highly populated city in Australia, Adelaide is regarded as one of the finest cities to work. It has diverse flourishing industries like Technology, Manufacturing, Electronics, Military, Viticulture, and government industries. This assures an extensive range of job openings for both immigrants as well as local graduates.

Many recent Engineering graduates have chosen to reside and work in Adelaide on the Subclass 476 Visa.

2. Brisbane – Queensland

A bubbling metropolitan area, Brisbane is situated in the southeastern corner of Australia. The robust growth of its economy has made Brisbane a leading corporate hub in Australia. Its top sectors include Electronics, IT, Manufacturing, Tourism and Government. So, suitably skilled candidates will not find it tough to find a job in the city.

3. Canberra - The Capital of Australia

Regarded as among the most affordable and safest capital cities globally, Canberra is an amazing place to live and work in Australia. The city offers job openings in IT and consulting sectors both within the private and government industries.

Teaching is another favoured employment option in Canberra as it is home to the top-ranked city in Australia and roughly 35,000 students.

4. Cairns – Queensland

Renowned for its closeness to the Great Barrier Reef, Cairns is a key hub for tourism in Australia. Further, it is a chief commercial hub for Northeastern Australia and thus offers abundant job opportunities. The chief sectors that offer job openings include Retail, Engineering, Tourism, Adventure, and Training and Education

5. Gold Coast – Queensland

One of the highly famed tourist hubs in Australia, Gold Coast is situated just north of Brisbane. It is a vibrant and lively city having a subtropical climate and a swiftly expanding economy. The city offers job openings in exciting and interesting sectors like Theme Parks and Surfing. This is apart from offering employment options in sectors such as Mining, Retail, Construction, Hospitality, and Tourism.

6. Hobart – Tasmania

The excellent transportation system, affordable rent, beautiful climate, and minimal pollution make Hobart one of the top cities to reside and work in Australia. The city offers remarkable job opportunities in sectors like Retail, Marine Manufacturing, Agribusiness and Aquaculture, Healthcare and Social Assistance, and Education and Training.

7. Melbourne – Victoria

One of the most highly densely populated and biggest cities in Australia, Melbourne boasts of a large economy that has a few of the top firms and national agencies in Australia. It offers excellent job openings in sectors like Information Technology, Financial Services, Retail and Training and Education. Further, Melbourne has a rather low rate of unemployment notwithstanding its sprawling population.

Talk to our expert

8. Newcastle - New South Wales

Renowned for its diverse geography and rich cultural heritage, Newcastle also has great natural splendour. Some of the key sectors offering diverse job opportunities are Aviation, Manufacturing, Maritime, Coal and Mining, Retail and Finance, Government Administration and Community Services, and Healthcare.

9. Perth - Western Australia

Fully surrounded by natural beauty, Perth offers innumerable opportunities for exploring nature and adventure activities. Moreover, it boasts of some truly remarkable job openings in diverse sectors. These include among others Technology, Environmental Sustainability, Agribusiness, Resources and Energy, Education and Training, Marine Engineering, and Mining Equipment.

5 Best Ways to Immigrate to Australia from India

10. Sydney - New South Wales

The largest and most famed city in Australia, Sydney is situated along the southern coastline of the nation. It is also the biggest economy in Australia and is home to the headquarters of many major MNCs. It is thus not surprising that many professionals who apply for Australia PR Visa from India choose to settle in Sydney.

The top job openings in Sydney are in industries like Information Technology, Banking, Financial Services, Retail, and Community Services and Healthcare.
